name: Peabody Resident Services INC
specialty: Custodial Care Facility, Adult Care Home

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Peabody Resident Services INC is a Custodial Care Facility, Adult Care Home provider based in Braintree, MA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $105.8M in Medicaid payments across 523K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $105.8M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 13,227 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
